select * from member order by m_regdate desc;

mapper.insert: insert into member(m_id, m_name, m_pass, m_email, m_phone, m_regdate, m_service_terms, m_privacy_terms, m_push_email, m_push_sms, m_push_app) values (#{id}, #{name}, password(#{pwd}), #{email}, #{phone}, #{regdate}, #{serviceAgree}, #{privacyAgree}, #{pushEmail}, #{pushSMS}, #{pushApp})
mapper.update: update member set m_pass = password(#{pwd}) where m_no = #{no}
